scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.docker:prod:arm:client:build: COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_DEFAULT_PLATFORM=linux/arm64 docker compose build mdp-client
scripts.docker:prod:arm:server:build: COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_DEFAULT_PLATFORM=linux/arm64 docker compose build mdp-server
